parameters.sqlQuery:
WITH invoice_base_data AS (
  SELECT 
    a.invoice.month AS invoice_month,
    a.cost + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(c.amount) FROM UNNEST(a.credits) AS c), 0) AS adjusted_cost,
    a.cost,
    a.billing_account_id,
    an.nombre AS account_name,
    a.service.description AS service_description,
    a.project.name AS project_name,
    FORMAT_TIMESTAMP('%Y-%m', PARSE_TIMESTAMP('%Y%m', a.invoice.month)) AS month,
    TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(PARSE_TIMESTAMP('%Y%m%d', CONCAT(a.invoice.month, '01')), WEEK(MONDAY)) AS week_start,
    DATE(PARSE_TIMESTAMP('%Y%m%d', CONCAT(a.invoice.month, '01'))) AS date
  FROM 
    `billing-cuentas-tivit.data_set_cuentas_global.gcp_billing_export_v1_01A7C8_2A13F5_47B1D5` AS a
  LEFT JOIN 
    `billing-cuentas-tivit.data_set_cuentas_global.accounts_name` AS an
  ON 
    a.billing_account_id = an.id_account
  WHERE 
    PARSE_TIMESTAMP('%Y%m', a.invoice.month) >= TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH))
),

usage_base_data AS (
  SELECT 
    a.usage_start_time,
    a.cost + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(c.amount) FROM UNNEST(a.credits) AS c), 0) AS adjusted_cost,
    a.billing_account_id,
    an.nombre AS account_name,
    a.service.description AS service_description,
    a.project.name AS project_name,
    FORMAT_TIMESTAMP('%Y-%m', a.usage_start_time) AS month, 
    TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(a.usage_start_time, WEEK(MONDAY)) AS week_start,
    DATE(a.usage_start_time) AS date
  FROM 
    `billing-cuentas-tivit.data_set_cuentas_global.gcp_billing_export_v1_01A7C8_2A13F5_47B1D5` AS a
  LEFT JOIN 
    `billing-cuentas-tivit.data_set_cuentas_global.accounts_name` AS an
  ON 
    a.billing_account_id = an.id_account
  WHERE 
    a.usage_start_time >= TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH))
),

-- Data agregada desde tabla invoice_base_data
monthly_cost AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    billing_account_id,
    account_name,
    SUM(adjusted_cost) AS total_cost
  FROM 
    invoice_base_data
  GROUP BY 
    month, billing_account_id, account_name
),

daily_cost AS (
  SELECT 
    FORMAT_TIMESTAMP('%Y-%m-%d', date) AS period,
    billing_account_id,
    account_name,
    SUM(adjusted_cost) AS total_cost
  FROM 
    invoice_base_data
  GROUP BY 
    date, billing_account_id, account_name
),

project_cost AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    billing_account_id,
    account_name,
    project_name,
    SUM(adjusted_cost) AS total_cost
  FROM 
    invoice_base_data
  GROUP BY 
    month, billing_account_id, account_name, project_name
),

service_cost AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    billing_account_id,
    account_name,
    service_description,
    SUM(adjusted_cost) AS total_cost
  FROM 
    invoice_base_data
  GROUP BY 
    month, billing_account_id, account_name, service_description
),

-- Data agregada desde tabla usage_base_data
weekly_cost AS (
  SELECT 
    FORMAT_TIMESTAMP('%Y-%W', week_start) AS period,
    billing_account_id,
    account_name,
    service_description,
    SUM(adjusted_cost) AS total_cost
  FROM 
    usage_base_data
  GROUP BY 
    week_start, billing_account_id, account_name, service_description
)

-- Unir resultados con "UNION ALL"
SELECT
  'monthly_cost' AS data_type,
  month AS period,
  NULL AS week_start,
  NULL AS date,
  billing_account_id,
  account_name,
  NULL AS project_name,
  NULL AS service_description,
  total_cost
FROM 
  monthly_cost

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'daily_cost' AS data_type,
  period AS period,
  NULL AS week_start,
  NULL AS date,
  billing_account_id,
  account_name,
  NULL AS project_name,
  NULL AS service_description,
  total_cost
FROM 
  daily_cost

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'project_cost' AS data_type,
  month AS period,
  NULL AS week_start,
  NULL AS date,
  billing_account_id,
  account_name,
  project_name,
  NULL AS service_description,
  total_cost
FROM 
  project_cost

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'service_cost' AS data_type,
  month AS period,
  NULL AS week_start,
  NULL AS date,
  billing_account_id,
  account_name,
  NULL AS project_name,
  service_description,
  total_cost
FROM 
  service_cost

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'weekly_cost' AS data_type,
  period AS period,
  NULL AS week_start,
  NULL AS date,
  billing_account_id,
  account_name,
  NULL AS project_name,
  service_description,
  total_cost
FROM 
  weekly_cost
